explains: n. 众多，大量；民众，群众，大批百姓；一大群人
wordGroup: a multitude of 大批的，众多的

sentences.en: It was an elite that believed its task was to enlighten the multitude.
sentences.cn: 精英人物都会认为自己的职责就是启迪群众。

sentences.en: He preached to the assembled multitude.
sentences.cn: 他向聚集在那里的民众布道。

sentences.en: The hideous truth was hidden from the multitude.
sentences.cn: 向大众隐瞒了丑恶的真相。
